sent_text: At the golden anniversary celebration of the signing of the United Nations Charter in San Francisco on June 26 , not a single elected Republican , including Gov. Pete Wilson of California , was politically brave enough to attend .

William Soutar , a Scottish poet , compared the seductiveness of a diary to that of a drink and saw in it a way of confirming , and valuing , individuality in all its manifestations  -COL-   -LBQ-  Not a single other creature in all the history of the world has been just as ourself ,  -RDQ-  he observed .
